column4: Hey I have a problem with my Mobile Internet - I connect the device, select the right internet provider but just as it is about to connect it comes up a warning saying "GSM Network - Disconnected", how can I fix this?

Hey I have a problem with my Mobile Internet - I connect the device, select the right internet provider but just as it is about to connect it comes up a warning saying "GSM Network - Disconnected", how can I fix this?

Hey I have a problem with my Mobile Internet - I connect the device, select the right internet provider but just as it is about to connect it comes up a warning saying "GSM Network - Disconnected", how can I fix this?
have you added profile to the MObile connection i.e have you correctly configured the network interface you wish to use?
